game.name: Crosshair X
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, Animation & Modeling, Design & Illustration, Education, Photo Editing, Utilities, Game Development
game.categories: Captions available, Steam Workshop, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud
game.shortDescription: 모든 게임에 커스텀 크로스헤어를 오버레이하세요. Crosshair X 커뮤니티가 만든 수천 개의 독특한 크로스헤어 중에서 선택하거나 디자이너를 사용하여 직접 디자인하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Overlay custom crosshairs on every game you play. Choose from thousands of unique crosshairs created by the Crosshair X community or design your own using the designer.

reviewHighlights.text: Good app, but uses a good amount of CPU Power and can hinder performance while using, would be a lot better if it was optimized.
very useful software for games, many crosshairs to choose from, overall for it's money i would even say a great product
